website_summaries.verdict: Costs noticeably less than other top-selling models with only slight differences in quality.
pros: Wax melts in as little as 8 minutes – faster than any other product on the market
Instead of wax cans, this comes with three varieties of pleasant-smelling wax beans
cons: Once the wax heats up to the proper temperature, the machine shuts itself off, leading some to believe it's broken

website_summaries.verdict: A simple-to-use wax warmer that heats up quickly and cleans up easily.
pros: Includes hard wax beads and applicator sticks
Adjustable temperature dial ranges from 160 to 240 degrees F. Easy to clean up
cons: Some users have complained about the warmer overheating

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a wax machine that works painlessly
customer_reviews.text: My past waxing experience have never been pleasant. No matter how careful I am, I always accidentally burn or painfully remove some skin. This waxing kit works like a dream. I wasn’t sure what to expect since this is my first kit without needing fabric strips. In fact, it was much easier to apply and grip to pull off. You can see in the picture my skin isn’t irritated or red, yet it caught a lot of my hair. I’ve used it on my face and arms and it works great for both areas.
customer_reviews.author: Ban V. Tran

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY WITH THIS WARMER!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wax warmer. Have used it about 40 times now with absolutely no issues. Wax that comes with them work great for me! Use this to remove the fine hairs on face as well as eyebrows that have a mind of their own and think they can grow wherever they please.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for myself instead of going to a salon to get my eyebrows waxed. Works great for inside of nose, eyebrows, mustache, husband's ears, you name it! Wax warms up quickly and stays warm. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom3

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I waited MONTHS to purchase this and I’m sooooo happy I finally did! Works amazing. Need to set the temp a little hotter then suggested but once I figured that out it’s been, literal, smooth sailing ⛵️😎 Even got my husband in on the fun. Great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: MoonMomma🌙

customer_reviews.title: Throwing out
customer_reviews.text: Hate this. I usually use wax strips but figured I would try this instead. Nope. Sticks to your skin, does not remove hair effectively, messy.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Amateur  and Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to use. My first one but does not seem like i need another. used the wax that came with it and it was amazing. didn't spread too easily but felt painless compared to one i am using now. downside to the wax is that it does not pull all the fine hairs out. Now it's like i have a mini waxing salon in my house. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This warmer is amazing! I don’t use the same wax, but the warmer works great!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually pleased with this product. For what it is, it's pretty cheap. It's really just a good deal. And it works fantastically. It's easy to store, and it comes with sticks and wax.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It's superimportant for me not to bring any harm to my skin.
customer_reviews.text: It's superimportant for me not to bring any harm to my skin. That was the reason why I've bought these very hard wax beans because they have natural elements in their ingredient list so they are not too harmful.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Damon

customer_reviews.title: Received used wax warmer.
customer_reviews.text: Check your wax warmer before use. Mine arrived in a slightly crushed box and wax warmer showed signs of use. There was wax residue leftover on metal tin and white plug had black marks on it. Disgusting and highly unsanitary.
customer_reviews.author: j.y

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love it just like us!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely please with how well this works. It is so easy to use, it dries quick once it’s on your skin & comes off so easy, along with the unwanted hair! I used it on mine & my daughters legs. They are so smooth & not a hair left in sight. My daughter is 10 & she even said that she enjoyed using it, it was pain free & she now prefers to wax over shaving her legs! Making a purchase soon to buy more wax beads! I am sold on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie Suarez

customer_reviews.title: WAX MAY CAUSE IRRITATION
customer_reviews.text: THE WAX MADE ME BREAK OUT LIKE IMMEDIATELY, i dont really know if its because i have sensitive skin, it wasnt that bad ripping off my arm but it really irritated my skin. just a heads up!
customer_reviews.author: Tymiah Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: It’s good not the best
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good w it I’ve had it for 5 months now. Only things is the bar to clean extra wax off comes unhooked and the outside of the machine gets hot to just keep touching trying to hold it down
customer_reviews.author: Karla Ponce de leon

customer_reviews.title: Good wax machine
customer_reviews.text: This wax machine works great , it is easy to work with it spreads easily and for me it’s painless . I used it for my legs and it left then very smooth and took out all the hair out I would really keep using this
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Use at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: Use your own hard wax. DO NOT USE THE HARD WAX IN THIS KIT. It is literally just melting plastic. I used my kit once and I’ve never been able to use it ever again because it’s ruined. I should’ve bought a wax kit from sallys for $80
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Pasquini

customer_reviews.title: Threw out b/c it didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. No one answered my requests. The warmer timed off within 5 minutes of heating up so the beads didn't melt. Tried to melt the beads with a different warmer and they were crap. This company doesn't allow bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Mixon

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: the wax does not work . You can however buy better quality wax and just use the warmer because it does seem to work well at getting the wax a nice consistency and it’s lightweight it just bothers me that none of the beads worked and I’ve been waxing for years so it’s not my technique that’s in question the product just isn’t good
customer_reviews.author: chantel meza

customer_reviews.title: lifestance wax warmer
customer_reviews.text: The actual warmer itself is great and easy to figure out, but I was disappointed in the wax. The wax did not stick to the hair and only removed about 30% of it. I had to go over one spot at least 3 times to remove most of the hair which left my skin raw. This could be because Of the way I did it but I did watch multiple how to videos on youtube so I assumed it was just the wax. I do recommend the warmer but maybe a different brand of wax, or regular wax instead of hard wax.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Chesley

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Not sure it If was the beads that came with the product or what but it didn’t work for me at all. I watched tutorials read the directions followed them through completely and there was really no effect. Wasted my money on trying the “next big thing”
customer_reviews.author: syani

customer_reviews.title: It has its pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like it but it’s super hard to clean, makes quite the mess and is stuck on anything it touches. It spreads easily but is pretty painful. I’ve tried a few types of wax and this one is probably one of the most effective but also painful it left a bruise on my leg from waxing and I very rarely bruise. Be extremely careful with the temperature because it needs to be hot enough it’s easy to spread but not to hot that it burns your skin and leaves a mark it’s pretty tedious to get it there it’s just trial and error really.
customer_reviews.author: Britney Javens

customer_reviews.title: Mine came broken. But still works great
customer_reviews.text: This wax machine came to me broken. I am only able to have it off or on on high. No in between temp. Which is inconvenient because once I want my wax to stay warm enough to still be melted but cold enough to put it on I am unable to adjust the settings . Wax is great and the value for it is great. But once again make sure it is not broken!
customer_reviews.author: Mgee

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: I have a bit of an unconventional work schedule which makes it hard to schedule in eyebrow appointments when you only have the weekend to get all your errands done. I figured I could save time and money doing things myself at home and bought this to give it a try. I was very impressed with the quality of the product and how easy it was to use. The warmer itself was easy to use, you can adjust the temperature. It melts the was quickly and it goes on smoothly. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great! Customer service not as good.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to get a home was system but was worried it wouldn't be as good as the salon. I am pleasantly suprised!! Everything was simple and easy to use. Even my hubby wanted to try. My original review 5 stars on product alone. I did buy this for review requested by retailer. Had Misunderstanding over refund. I do not have PayPal account and do not want one do to scams that have occurred. They refuse to refund in any other way. Product works but I will not be ordering again due to this. Customer service interaction insistent I get PayPal or use someone else's. Made me uncomfortable therefore changing my view of company.
customer_reviews.author: Brea M

customer_reviews.title: Easiest waxing kit ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is AMAZING!! I have never used a home waxing kit before and was a little worried about doing it on my own. I originally got it for my teen daughter because she’s a soccer player and waxing is easier than shaving every few days. We plugged it in, heated up the wax beads which went really quickly and were able to start waxing. The pain is super mild especially compared to other waxing I’ve tried. I will definitely do this again and will be buying my sister one for her house.
customer_reviews.author: BeHappy

customer_reviews.title: Worked about half dozen times
customer_reviews.text: A little late to be posting this. But, I bought this for my wife and she’s used it maybe a half dozen times. Went to use it the other day and it will not turn on. I realize it’s been a while since we purchased, but as little as it’s been used I figured it was important to let people know not to expect it to last very long. It worked good while it lasted though.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When I turn the job to melt my wax it is broken and warmed the wax halfway through and then wouldn’t turn back on anymore. I just received it today super sad and will be returning hoping to find a better one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon addicted

customer_reviews.title: good for at home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a starter kit for at home and I thought it was okay. It’s hard to spread it onto larger areas. I’m not sure if it’s because of the wooden sticks it comes with or just because it’s difficult to pick up the necessary amount. The pain level was minimum and only slightly burned myself a couple of times. I really hate how the little bowl inside moves around because it makes it that much harder to pick up the wax. I wish the bar across the top was removable too so that cleaning would be easier.
customer_reviews.author: JyS

customer_reviews.title: Not working, company ignored me!
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this machine to my sister for her birthday. She told me it didn't work & i thought maybe she just wasn't using it right. I live 6 hrs away from her so i couldn't help until the next time i visited. I am a cosmetologist so i did the proper & correct steps & it did not work. It melted but wouldnt stick to your skin & you couldn't make it too hot or you'll burn the skin. I emailed the company & got no reply. I wouldn't recommend this product to anyone. Now im out money & my sister has this machine thats just worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: The black wax machine came with 3 bags of beans and 10 applicator sticks. This wax machine is wonderful and it is easy to use. It is lightweight and heats up my wax in about 10 to 20 minutes. It warms the wax up to the perfect temperature and keeps it at the temp until you turn it off. It is very to turn on and the cover keeps the heat in and dust out. I like being able to control the temperature. Everything you need to do it in your home and the warmer is effective and reliable. It is worth it to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Ho

customer_reviews.title: Does not remove hair as easily as other wax kits
customer_reviews.text: Waited to use it. When I used it, it did not remove the hair as easily as other kits, and I had a breakout on my lower leg, which I have never experienced. I tried to return, but the time had expired. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonista

customer_reviews.title: Great waxing product!
customer_reviews.text: The wax worked better than expected! Wax can be a tricky product to use and if the formula isn’t properly made, it can be a nightmare. This wax formula is made extremely well. I’m hoping to be purchase more from this company and hopefully be able to purchase in bulk as I’m a professional and need large quantities at one time!
customer_reviews.author: Oday

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Wish the temp control would stay at a tempt that’s not too hot not too cold. My strategy is make it real hot then wait for it to cool and make sure I blow on it but it’s impossible to find the right temp and keep it on there but otherwise it’s been easy. Can buy any brand beans to put in there and it does heat up real quick as well
customer_reviews.author: shantelle

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product it worked great. I’ve had it for a few weeks and used it once so far. Wax was good. Auto temp was a little slow to restart itself at times, but you can just turn it on yourself if you notice the wax consistency changing. When I opened the box the oil that was an after spray had leaked all over the products and almost half the bottom was gone. Also I was disappointed that the disposable paper ring that is meant to protect the top of the wax pot does not fit. I had to cut and rip it to make it fit. But all minor annoyances. I’d recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jwo808

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate! BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: So I got my waxing kit in the mail today, and just me say even if you’re inexperienced, this wax is easy use! The beads are not bad, and most of my hair came up in the first strip. It reminds me of a true professional line. I’m a licensed cosmetologist btw so I know good and bad wax. I used it for my face today and tomorrow I’ll be using it for my Brazilian. Easy temperature controls, easy to spread as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiera Wilford

customer_reviews.title: Space saving kit with plenty of wax
customer_reviews.text: This kit is pretty good for the price. Pretty similar to what you would get at Sally's and works just as well. It comes with a lid and a removable pot to clean out once done but I normally just leave my wax in there after each time. It comes with plenty of applicator sticks as well. Overall great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nour

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: It shuts off once its "hot enough" but doesn't remain hot. And well that causes the wax to harden faster and it's VERY PAINFUL. Use with caution. Or don't.
customer_reviews.author: SeeValentin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value for A Packed Kit of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wax warmer with a cool knob and features so far. Appears to have lots of good stuff in this kit to use and learn and was an excellent price you can’t beat. Comes with lots of stuff like popsicle sticks and waxing beads included with directions and pre-post wax bottles! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: AZDesertMonsoons89

customer_reviews.title: 1st Attempt Review
customer_reviews.text: Received this and I was very nervous to try at first. I finally tried it and just wish I did it sooner. Love it. I used it on my face and my face is so smooth. I have Only tried it once, so that’s why I did (4) stars. I may update my review if it keeps working and works in other areas. Tip: the instructions stated to heat and then turn down to a warmer temp. Turning it down made it harder too quick. Keep it at desired heat during waxing period.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Lange

customer_reviews.title: Almost Bled Out
customer_reviews.text: I used this to wax my gentlemanly bits, and almost bled right out. I haven't been in so much pain since 'Nam. Every follicle was crying out against the dermal atrocity I'd committed. I tried continuously for about an hour and a half to remove all the hair, but ended up crying loudly and trying to soothe my aching junk with aloe and oil.
customer_reviews.author: Ben States

customer_reviews.title: Wax heated up quickly!
customer_reviews.text: This heated up the wax quickly. Good value and quality. It included everything I needed to get going on my husbands eyebrows. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-Holic

customer_reviews.title: Learning Curve
customer_reviews.text: I’m a beginner but I think the included wax isn’t a very good quality. I definitely picked up on how thick to spread it and everything quickly but it still didn't grab all my hairs. It smells strongly and awful and it gave me a headache. I havent decided if I’m going to return it yet; going to try better wax beads
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever
customer_reviews.text: Overall it does what it is supposed to do but it takes 30 minutes for the wax to melt at the highest temperature setting . May be it’s me who is impatient but it’s too long for me to sit and wait . Im
customer_reviews.author: Abe kap

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The entire kit is super easy to use! I loved it. The pre wax treatment spray removes all the residue and everything, the waxing beads are superb! And the melting pot was awesome too!! It was my first time waxing myself at home and it wasnt complicated at all. Very good product.. the only minor thing that I didnt like was that the bags were the waxing beads come are too small. So too wax both of my bottom parts of the leg I had to use 2 bags... But overall, it is a great product and great for sensitive skin too
customer_reviews.author: Steffi

customer_reviews.title: Best at home waxing kit
customer_reviews.text: Loveeeeeee this so much! This waxing kit has been a lifesaver during quarentine! Since I can’t get my Brazilian done while everything is closed, these allow me to get the job done in my own home! Hurts a little but all waxing does! Plus it has such good temp control, comes with waxing beads already inside and the sprays that will help calm it down!
customer_reviews.author: Heatherthepunster

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only 6 days of use !
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for 6 days 😩 it was a great pot but it won’t heat up after only 6 days the pot will turn on and the light comes on but will not heat at all sad because I really like the pot and the wax beads were great but now I have a new pot in my new salon with no way to melt the wax
customer_reviews.author: JaQui

customer_reviews.title: Great product and problem resolution from company.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, but with 3 items missing from their product description listing. Company responded quickly with a resolution, and after acquiring the items I needed, I can say the kit works very well and removes hair both fine and thick without much pain. Very kind of the company to reach out and fix things efficiently. I recommend this item, highly.
customer_reviews.author: Galactus

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My nail tech has been waxing my eyebrows for years, but I have extremely sensitive skin & waxing other parts of my face has always caused severe bumps, making me look like I was breaking out with chicken pox for days afterwards, so I stuck with tweezing. Since COVID I've been doing my own nails & finally broke down & ordered this wax kit for my brows. I decided since I hardly leave the house & am masked when I do, to try this on my lip & chin as well. This is truly for sensitive skin, as I have no bumps! This is so great, I'll continue to do it myself, even once we're past this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great product, needs more instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience using hard wax and I loved it. The temperature control was very easy to use in the wax beads included are pretty nice. This kit also includes a before and after solution which is really nice. The only thing I wish they could make this kit better with some better instructions on how to apply the wax.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Not working well
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to use, and it don’t works good. I got this for about a years and I only use for once. I would return it immediately If I know that even if I have used the product, I can still return it!
customer_reviews.author: mlin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Package!
customer_reviews.text: Im an at home waxer, and I found this pot to be able to hold temperature very even. Before I would have spots on my other pot that were very hot or very cold. This one managed to evenly heat everything. Also the actual wax beads worked very well. I’m used to using starpil because of how easy it is to create a tab to pull. But this one actually worked really well. Managed to do my Brazilian, legs, armpits, AND face with it.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 2 years ago! Wow...I hadn't realized how long it's been. Anyways this works great and I have not had any issues since purchasing it. The only downside is cleaning it, you have to make sure its still warm (not hot) and grab a slightly dampened cloth towel to clean the inside of the tub. Other than that I've used it from the date of purchase to this year. It's cheaper then going to a Salon. :) Great buy
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this. Not sure if it’s the quality of beads or what. But it wouldn’t spread at all and where I managed to get it on my skin it won’t take the hair off.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Druin

customer_reviews.title: This is a great choice!
customer_reviews.text: After visiting the salon regularly, they suggested I buy a wax pot to save myself some money. So I immediately searched on amazon and read hundreds of reviews for different wax pots. I decided on this one and I’m glad I did. I’ve used it for a few months now and I have absolutely no complaints! It comes with everything you need and works fantastically!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I hate having to go to the salon every time I need to wax. This product is amazing and is easy to use. I seen some people mentioned to not use the wax that comes with this product, however, it worked just fine for me, I'm sure it's just personal preference. Product comes with wax & sticks. Warmer heats up quickly and keeps wax warm.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Lesinszkie

customer_reviews.title: I received a USED item
customer_reviews.text: I bought it last year, and I received a USED item. The reason why I review it today is because while I was checking the order history, I saw it. It reminds me the unforgettable experience. So gross! The pot was used, and even hairs inside the gel. Unforgettable for whole life.
customer_reviews.author: Yanan Tao

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for almost 4 years now and it’s still going strong. Love it, just have to get good wax beads. I would recommend the “PoundWaxness Wax Necessities Polymer Blend Luxury Hard Wax Charcoal 2.2 Pound“ also found here on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly shocked
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy the waxing kit is to use. Felt like I was at a studio/ shop. I would say it can get pretty messy the way it’s spreads if your not quick enough. I like how it comes with three different color beans and I feel like the colors are how strong they are . I used The darker colors on my lady parts and it was a pleasant experiences. I was surprisingly shocked how easy and painless it was toward myself as suppose to going and getting it done by a professional. So pleased with the purchase . Will be ordering more wax beans
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was excited about this product but once I got it to the perfect temperature which was trial and error, it didn’t adhere to the hairs on my face. I did everything according to instructions but it didn’t work for me. Face was clean, no oil on face. Was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Frandsen

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price point!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my GiGi warmer that only had an on/off switch, which meant that I have burned myself too many times to count. I was immediately impressed because the box came with a sanitary seal that left the word “void” when I removed it, showing that it had not been tampered with until I touched it. Inside, the pieces were nicely packaged, and the warmer itself was easy to unwrap and plug in. The temperature control works super well and is a much needed solution for my burns!
customer_reviews.author: Cailet Huckabee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical because the price was very cheap and it came with everything you could possibly think of to assist in getting the perfect wax. It heated very evenly and in like 15 min . I tested it on a patch of leg hair and it plucked every single hair and it barely made me cringe like most waxes does. I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.author: Mandee merhish

customer_reviews.title: Great wax pot
customer_reviews.text: I already use a wax brand I love but the wax included in this warmer worked great. I love that I can warm the wax fast on here then lower the temperature when It has melted. It has a sleek look also.
customer_reviews.author: YOPORO

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The setup process was fairly easy. It took way longer for the wax to heat up at the specified temperature. The wax went on smooth, but did not remove any hair for me. I used the cleaning solution and tested different areas of my body. All with the same result. I don’t recommend buying this product it is a waste of time and money. I don’t want to have to wax my legs 8000 times in a row just to get all the hair off and smooth skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kayli Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This product works well. The heating allows for complete melting of the wax beads. The beads that come in this package are alright. I ended up purchasing another brand of wax beads. However the actual pot itself is great! Buy this and save money by DIY!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I love my small waxing machine. In order to clean it make sure the machine is on but BE VERY CAUTIOUS and use a napkin to remove off the remaining wax. I normally use the Popsicle stick to hold the napkin and remove the remaining wax.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Controlling the temperature is what makes it great.
customer_reviews.text: The wax works well. I like the ability to control the temperature. The bottles of before and after treatment oils are either too small or the sprayer tubes are too big. They don't fit together.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for my clients and it doesn’t even heat up. I’ve tried different outlets. Update: The customer service was great! I returned the pot and they offered to send me a new one or refund me.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use, easy to clean. heats up pretty quickly and evenly. It works well enough on canned wax as well as the wax beads. very sleek looking and it comes with everything you need. It comes with an instruction manual explaining all about someone need to know to use and maintain this warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Brijesh Narula

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this for about 5 months now. I havent had any problems other than there is a metal bar inside that i have to reattach a lot but im pretty sure it's made to come out for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie Manzanilla

customer_reviews.title: Died on me under a year
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful warmer. It’s practical, melts your wax in no time. You can become a pro in just a few uses in the convenience of your own home. Clean up is easy too. But this machine died on me just under a year :( it doesn’t heat up the wax! It has nothing to do with changing outlet location or the gfci outlets. It simply gave out. Very disappointed in its lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Vegan Hottie

customer_reviews.title: one and done (sigh)
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed. I was super excited to use the wax set given that we're in a pandemic. The first time I used it, everything went as expected. Yes I felt like I was human again. However when I plugged it up a second time .... you know 4 weeks later for a touch up . it stop working. Doesn't heat up anymore. Just dead. I cant return it now (sigh) I've past the return window to do so and now I'm stuck with a broken machine and dream 😫 I do not recommend this product as its only works once
customer_reviews.author: Edwina Roy-Pounds

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: As someone who’s never experienced waxing before, or as i should say, doing it at home, this is the perfect kit. There is a learning curve to perfecting distribution of the wax, etc, but the directions given in the box give really useful tips to make your waxing experience perfect. They give you 3 “trial” packs of wax. Since purchasing, i have gone through one of those packs. I will be purchasing more in the near future. 10/10 recommend to anyone who is debating on purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have good luck with this product it's sat on my shelf for months
customer_reviews.author: paul wall

customer_reviews.title: painless and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: wax warmer helps you avoiding visits to salon. Feel the same as that of a salon. Good product. will buy again
customer_reviews.author: sneha

customer_reviews.title: Stringy and messy.
customer_reviews.text: It did remove hair. Was AMAZING for brows. Everything else, not so much My legs reacted poorly. It was so stringy I felt like I was covered in cobwebs. And it was messy in general. However I’m a N00b. Might work better for others 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the purchase of this warmer. This was my first time waxing at home, and it was so easy to do with this warmer. Wish I had bought one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have just got my waxing kit and used it one time . my first time was messy but effective. I hope to get better so that I can never have to go to the salon again.
customer_reviews.author: lifeoflove

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Takes awhile for wax to melt the first time. Doesnt seem to remove all the hair but also feel like it takes practice and i havent had much yet.
customer_reviews.author: DMBrown

customer_reviews.title: Love this wax kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this warmer! I dont like the hard wax beads too much, it goes on too thin, so its hard to grip and rip it off. But it will get the unwanted hairs off! Overall great little kit. Comes with everything you need to get it done
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Repurchase
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to use this multiple times. I am not sure if it is my fault or if the product really isn't that great but whenever I use it and rip off the wax, it just doesn't pull out all my hairs. The wax warmer seems to be doing a great job but the wax that came with it could be the main problem. Either way, I'm still going to keep trying but if you do decide to buy this, I would buy a different wax!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Useful and works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I have only used once but the wax heats up quickly. I used the suggested temp and I didn’t burn. Obviously waxing doesn’t feel great but the hard wax worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Briana BC

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh no
customer_reviews.text: This product is okay, like the temperature that's okay. but the waxing beads no they suck. I've done at home waxing before and my skin has never been so irritated that it looks like I burn myself. I hate rlly hot stuff so I made sure the wax wasn't as hot when I applied it. it didn't take out all the hair either even when I applied pressure, i applied the wax in the same place 3 times and the hair still didn't fully come off. guys just get the strips. I would not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Im so glad I bought this! I’m now saving a ton of money from not going to the salon! Very easy to use and works great! My only regret is not buying this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: brit25us

customer_reviews.title: Won’t burn
customer_reviews.text: This heats to the right temperature without burning but hot enough for the wax to spread evenly. Arrived with three bags of wax, in three colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Wax that comes with isn't good
customer_reviews.text: Wax that came with wasn't very good. As the husband being the test dummy I didn't like it. New review will come with a better wax and me getting tested on again!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Product works great and is super easy to use. The wax is non scented, and hardly leaves any redness on my skin. The instructions are clear, and the heating pot is small and looks nice. I had never used wax prior to this purchase, and I'm completely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Wax machine heats up my wax just fine
customer_reviews.text: Received everything except for the bottles in the picture . Not sure what those are since I didn’t get them . Anyways wax not so good but I purchased this product for the wax machine only . I wanted a black one
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to set up, and use. I’ve never done at home waxing so I’m still learning, but this made it very easy. I think i will try a couple different kinds of waxes to see if a more sticky base would get all those tiny hairs that I missed this time.
customer_reviews.author: Myndy Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great choice if you don’t want to pay for a wax somewhere. Totally recommended. Seller was very attentive to see if I was happy with my product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: good gift for my wife
customer_reviews.text: my wifes really likes it. she tried one of the wax bean bag came with it.and she got impress how wax stays liquidy and not to worry about melting every 5 min.
customer_reviews.author: duval

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but messy!!
customer_reviews.text: It melts the wax super quickly & doesn’t get too hot! pretty messy even with the metal bar to wipe on. Strands of wax will be everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually super impressed by this. It heats the wax evenly and spreads perfect. Grabs the hairs great as well. Make sure to test on your hand before applying to people’s faces because it can get seriously hot
customer_reviews.author: Bonefsh64

customer_reviews.title: All in one
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and worth the money that i paid. Came with a wax, before and after skin wax product and wood stick for apply the product . Had everything you need. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: iris sierra

customer_reviews.title: Wax would break before stripping it off
customer_reviews.text: I think it was not a good investment. The was not working as expected. When put on the skin, it would dry so fast that it broke before stripping it off.
customer_reviews.author: Shashank

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I absolutely love the wax warmer kit. It makes my life so much easier because I don’t have to make numerous trips to pay a professional. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mabry

customer_reviews.title: The best damn at home professional waxer ever!
customer_reviews.text: Due to COVID-19 I had no other choice but to purchase an at home waxer and let me tell you its has been the best decision of my life!!! Not only am I saving a boat load of money but it's so easy to use, setup was very easy, the wax works great and I don't have to wait to be seen. I absolutely love my at home waxer! I DO reccomend this product and if I had to I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Small but Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little wax warmer. I like that it doesn't take up too much space and is easy to use. It is very affordable and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Dubois

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this kit! The wax melts fast and stays smooth and it very consistent. The wax does not get super hot because of the temperature control so it does not hurt when you put it on. It was super easy to spread with the wax sticks. I will need to order more wax beads because they are easy to use! I really Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Chavez

customer_reviews.title: No more shaving!
customer_reviews.text: With all the salons closed during this pandemic, I have gone without waxing and have made do with shaving. Omg why did I wait so long?! It was easy to learn the process and to tell the truth, quite satisfying. The result is, I'm never going back to the salon, its DIY with Lifestance all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for Station in Salon!
customer_reviews.text: This was so nice and very professional looking. I liked. Great Kit! The wax is really nice to work with. And I love that it came with the oils for pre & post wax. The price was great to!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne & Joseph Muro

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product really impressed me. It goes on so smooth and comes off easily. Warm it up a little more to make it easier. Easy clean up which makes taking the time to do it more manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Smithley

product_meta.title: Lifestance Wax Warmer Hair Removal Kit, L1 Waxing Kit with 3 Bags Hard Wax Beans and 20 Wax Applicator Sticks for Full Body, Legs, Face, Eyebrows, Bikini Women Men Painless At Home Waxing
feature_bullets: 🌞 BE YOURSELF ESTHETICIAN - Save lots of time and money with DIY at-home waxing. As an all-in-one home waxing kit, provide everything you need, achieve the high-level effect as the salon you want, make your skin smooth, no irritation, and no residue.

🌞 FORMULATED FOR SENSITIVE AREAS - Infused with fragrant lavender, blueberry, blackberry essential oil, is suitable for all areas of the body, especially the more delicate areas, while its strength will be also effective on the coarse hairs.

🌞 WAX KIT INCLUDES - Wax Warmer 500 ml (1 unit), Large Size Wooden Spatulas(10pieces), Small Size Wooden Spatulas(10pieces), 3 packs of different favor hard wax beans (Blueberry, Lavender, Black), Pre-wax Treatment Spray and After-wax Treatment Oil

🌞 DURABLE ELECTRIC WAX WARMER - Quality for wax warmer vary on market. The difference between Lifestance wax warmer and markets are for the 100% copper wire and molded in update durable ABS heat assistant material. With adjustable heat options from 160-240 ℉, the wax will heat up faster than normal wax warmer.

🌞 THREE YEARS WARRANTY - For whatever reason you don’t love Lifestance wax warmer kit, let us know so we can give you a full refund or send you a replacement, NO questions asked. Click the "Add to Cart" Button NOW and become the captain of your Beauty!
